__e: Anyway, she was telling someone how they could do what they were doing much better if they'd only do it just like her.
Hey, I didn't do anything your friends don't do, and you spent seven years with them.
Except... if they did have sex, then he wouldn't have needed you.
As if they've got any choice in the matter.
I told my men to kill your mother, if they didn't hear from me.
I told them I'd come, just in case they needed me.
Hey, thought your phone was busted.
I feel like someone took my heart and shoved it right... that's what I want to hear.
My uncle told me what to do if ever he was- If ever he was taken.
Well, I don't know how they had a fantasy about me in the first place, but...
Maybe if they had a mom like mine, They wouldn't be the pieces of shit that they are currently.
Ugh, it's like those people don't even have homes.
Yeah it's like they have there own little language.
I thought it was strange that all the other kids in school had a dad and I didn't. One time I asked her: "Where's mine?".
It was long before we had a name.
And if your daughter had been told that there was hope in this treatment?
If anyone had told me that I could care for a child as I care for Cedric,
If you'd have told me a few years ago I'd be seeing a 29-year-old...
You think if people said how great she was to her face, none of this would've ever happened?
If you'd have told me a few years ago I'd be seeing a 29-year-old...
